page.title: 17CONTEMPORARY LIFE (BUSES)
page.content: A questionnaire was circulated through the school and Women's Institute of which we received about 40 completed forms. Over half the families who replied were not born in Worcestershire. The area is poorly supplied with bus services, though the{B4196}(off the map) has the hourly{BIRMINGHAM/ {STOURPORT/ WORCESTER}service. The A451 has two services a day between{ {EARDISTON}and {KIDDERMINSTER}on Thursdays and Saturdays only.There is also a regular return service between{ {ABERYSTWYTH}and{KIDDERMINSTER}each Saturday and Sunday. Shops are non-existent, for the local shop which recently ceased as a Sub Post Office is on the B4196 as is the smallholder's shop which caters for all greengrocery needs, so most people travel to Stourport.
